Name: Affogato
Description: Rich black coffee with a scoop of vanilla ice cream melting inside.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Café negro con una cucharada de helado de vainilla que se derrite por dentro.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 바닐라 아이스크림 한 숟갈이 녹아있는 블랙커피.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Reichhaltiger schwarzer Kaffee mit einer Kugel Vanilleeis, die darin schmilzt.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 浓郁的黑咖啡，往里混入一勺香草冰淇淋。
